Division of Coal Mine Workers' Compensation (Black Lung Benefits)

A compensation is available to coal miners who were totally disabled by pneumoconiosis arising out of coal mine employment, and to survivors of coal miners whose deaths are attributable to the disease.
The program also provides eligible miners with medical coverage for the treatment of lung diseases related to pneumoconiosis.
